item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to ftard.me! You have finaly found a site that is about you! Or perhaps me, or you,… or me you and everybody to. You may be asking ‘how would there be a website that knows about you the way that most everyone that knows you do?’ Well the answer to that question is quite long and full of extremely boring matharymical arithmaticy AlGore-isms. I find the best way to understand is just not to at all!
